divs: Sighting DetailsIt was November 7th of 2009. The view of the mountains by the kitchen window was magnificent. The snow was covering the top of the mountains that I see and love everyday. I took my camera outside my backyard and took some pictures, before the snow started melting. When I started seeing the pictures I took, I notice a sharp glowing object with it's shadow underneath my feelings were that only a camera captures anything out of the ordinary that we humans are not capable of seeing. To me the shade under the light was a flying object and the light that the camera captures was some kind of radiation from the flying object.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Palm Springs
There were no other sightings in Palm Springs on or around December 7th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Light with a shadow under
